item.description:
We'll meet in Falmouth at the parking lot by the Peter Pan Bus Terminal. It's at 59 Depot Ave Falmouth MA

From there we will ride along the scenic Shinning sea bike path to Woods Hole. Take the Steamship Authority Ferry to Oak Bluffs, then take the Seaview Avenue bike path to Edgartown, have lunch and then pedal back to Oak Bluffs for evening and/or return on the Ferry.

More details to follow as we get a count on members going

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Shining sea bike path to Edgartown
